title: A play of loue a newe and a mery enterlude concernyng pleasure and payne in loue, made by Iho[a]n Heywood. The players names. A man a louer not beloued. A woman beloued not louyng. A man a louer and beloued. The vyse nother louer nor beloued.
author: Heywood, John, 1497?-1580?
publicationStmtDate: M. ccccc. xxxiiii. Cum priuilegio Regali] [1534]
